paragraphs.body: While it is on the Fanon wiki, some of the listed shippings are being deemed unacceptable by some of the users, myself included. Go or no go for deletion? Bassmasta2012 (talk • contribs) 22:07, October 9, 2010 (UTC)

paragraphs.body: As much as I think this page causes no harm at all, It is causing problems amongst out community, and with that said, delete it. I Must say that we keep it. It's fanon, people are over reacting to the page, it's a great reference to fanon writers to find the shippings out there.
